vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: A root vegetable, typically orange in color, that is crisp and sweet.

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.description: A green vegetable with a tree-like structure, known for its high nutritional value.

vegetables.name: Spinach
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable that is rich in iron and vitamins, often used in salads and cooking.

vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.description: A starchy tuber that is a staple food in many cultures, versatile in cooking.

vegetables.name: Tomato
vegetables.description: A red or yellow fruit that is commonly used as a vegetable in cooking, rich in vitamins.

vegetables.name: Cucumber
vegetables.description: A long, green vegetable with a refreshing taste, often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Bell Pepper
vegetables.description: A colorful vegetable that comes in green, red, yellow, and orange varieties, known for its sweet flavor.

vegetables.name: Lettuce
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable that is a staple in salads, available in many varieties.

vegetables.name: Onion
vegetables.description: A bulb vegetable with a strong flavor and aroma, used in a wide variety of dishes.

vegetables.name: Zucchini
vegetables.description: A green summer squash with a mild flavor, often used in cooking and baking.

vegetables.name: Eggplant
vegetables.description: A purple or white vegetable with a spongy texture, used in various culinary dishes.

vegetables.name: Radish
vegetables.description: A root vegetable with a peppery flavor, often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Beetroot
vegetables.description: A root vegetable that is deep red or purple, sweet in taste and often used in salads or as a natural dye.

vegetables.name: Celery
vegetables.description: A green, crunchy vegetable often used in salads, soups, and as a snack.

vegetables.name: Kale
vegetables.description: A dark green, leafy vegetable that is highly nutritious, often used in salads, smoothies, and soups.

vegetables.name: Sweet Potato
vegetables.description: A tuber with a sweet flavor, often used in cooking and baking.

vegetables.name: Pumpkin
vegetables.description: A large, orange squash often used in pies, soups, and as a Halloween decoration.

vegetables.name: Turnip
vegetables.description: A root vegetable with a slightly sweet, earthy flavor, often used in stews and soups.

vegetables.name: Cabbage
vegetables.description: A leafy green or purple vegetable used in salads, coleslaw, and various cooked dishes.

vegetables.name: Peas
vegetables.description: Small, round green vegetables that grow in pods, often used in soups and as a side dish.

vegetables.name: Asparagus
vegetables.description: A green, spear-shaped vegetable known for its unique flavor, often grilled or steamed.

vegetables.name: Cauliflower
vegetables.description: A white, flowering vegetable that is versatile in cooking, often used as a low-carb substitute.

vegetables.name: Brussels Sprouts
vegetables.description: Small, green, cabbage-like vegetables that are often roasted or steamed.

vegetables.name: Artichoke
vegetables.description: A green, thistle-like vegetable with a tender heart and flavorful leaves.

vegetables.name: Leek
vegetables.description: A long, green and white vegetable with a mild onion flavor, often used in soups and stews.

vegetables.name: Garlic
vegetables.description: A bulbous plant with a strong flavor and aroma, used as a seasoning in many dishes.

vegetables.name: Chard
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with colorful stems, known for its slightly bitter flavor.

vegetables.name: Bok Choy
vegetables.description: A type of Chinese cabbage with white stems and green leaves, often used in Asian cuisine.

vegetables.name: Butternut Squash
vegetables.description: A sweet, nutty-flavored winter squash with orange flesh, often used in soups and baking.

vegetables.name: Green Beans
vegetables.description: Long, slender green vegetables that are crisp and often used in salads and as a side dish.

vegetables.name: Okra
vegetables.description: A green, pod-like vegetable often used in soups and stews, known for its slimy texture when cooked.

vegetables.name: Parsnip
vegetables.description: A root vegetable similar to a carrot, but paler and sweeter in flavor.

vegetables.name: Fennel
vegetables.description: A vegetable with a bulbous base, feathery leaves, and a licorice-like flavor.

vegetables.name: Collard Greens
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with a slightly bitter taste, often used in Southern cooking.

vegetables.name: Shallot
vegetables.description: A type of onion with a milder flavor, often used in gourmet cooking.

vegetables.name: Endive
vegetables.description: A leafy vegetable with a slightly bitter taste, often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Rutabaga
vegetables.description: A root vegetable with a slightly sweet and earthy flavor, often used in soups and stews.

vegetables.name: Watercress
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with a peppery flavor, often used in salads and as a garnish.

vegetables.name: Radicchio
vegetables.description: A leafy vegetable with a slightly bitter taste, often used in salads and Italian dishes.

vegetables.name: Acorn Squash
vegetables.description: A small, green winter squash with sweet, orange flesh, often roasted or baked.

vegetables.name: Scallion
vegetables.description: A green onion with a mild flavor, often used as a garnish or in salads.

vegetables.name: Snow Peas
vegetables.description: Flat, green peas that are eaten whole, often used in stir-fries and salads.

vegetables.name: Jicama

vegetables.name: Bean Sprouts
vegetables.description: Young shoots of beans, often used in Asian cuisine for their crunchy texture.

vegetables.name: Bamboo Shoots
vegetables.description: Young shoots of bamboo plants, often used in Asian cuisine for their crunchy texture.

vegetables.name: Kohlrabi

vegetables.name: Pattypan Squash

vegetables.name: Tomatillo

vegetables.description: A starchy tuber with a sweet flavor, often used in cooking and baking.

vegetables.name: Celeriac
vegetables.description: A root vegetable with a mild celery flavor, often used in soups and stews.

vegetables.name: Rhubarb

vegetables.name: Mustard Greens
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with a peppery flavor, often used in salads and Southern cooking.

vegetables.name: Dandelion Greens
vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with a slightly bitter taste, often used in salads.

vegetables.description: A root vegetable with a slightly sweet, earthy flavor, often used in Asian cuisine.

vegetables.name: Lotus Root

vegetables.name: Chayote

vegetables.name: Jerusalem Artichoke

vegetables.name: Seaweed

vegetables.name: Parsley

vegetables.name: Basil

vegetables.name: Mint
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in cooking and beverages for its refreshing flavor.

vegetables.name: Rosemary
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in cooking for its pine-like flavor.

vegetables.name: Thyme
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in cooking for its earthy, minty flavor.

vegetables.name: Oregano
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in Italian and Greek cuisine for its strong, savory flavor.

vegetables.name: Cilantro
vegetables.description: A leafy herb often used in Mexican and Asian cuisine for its fresh, citrusy flavor.

vegetables.name: Dill

vegetables.name: Sage
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in cooking for its earthy, slightly peppery flavor.

vegetables.name: Chives

vegetables.name: Tarragon

vegetables.name: Marjoram
vegetables.description: A fragrant herb often used in cooking for its sweet, pine-like flavor.

vegetables.name: Lovage

vegetables.name: Sorrel

vegetables.name: Borage

vegetables.name: Purslane
vegetables.description: A leafy green with a slightly sour, salty flavor, often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Nasturtium

vegetables.name: Arugula
vegetables.description: A leafy green with a peppery flavor, often used in salads.

vegetables.name: Mustard
vegetables.description: A leafy green with a sharp, peppery flavor, often used in salads and cooking.

vegetables.description: A leafy green with a slightly sweet, nutty flavor, often used in salads and cooking.

vegetables.name: Perilla
vegetables.description: A leafy herb with a slightly minty, basil-like flavor, often used in Asian cuisine.

vegetables.name: Orach
vegetables.description: A leafy green with a slightly salty flavor, often used in salads and cooking.

vegetables.description: The leafy tops of radishes, with a slightly peppery flavor, often used in salads.

vegetables.description: A leafy green vegetable with small broccoli-like florets, known for its slightly bitter flavor.

vegetables.name: Escarole
